versionA.text: The following question refers to the data shown below, as well as the data shown to your collaboration partner. Your table shows the pulse rate per minute of a group of 100 adults. For example, 5 adults have a pulse rate from 40-49 inclusive. However, some ink has been spilled on the table.  What is the average pulse rate per minute for these 100 people?

versionB.text: The following question refers to the data shown below, as well as the data shown to your collaboration partner. Your figure shows the pulse rate per minute of a group of 100 adults. For example, 5 adults have a pulse rate from 40-49 inclusive. However, some ink has been spilled on the figure. What is the average pulse rate per minute for these 100 people?
